column1: All rodent species were maintained on powdered laboratory rodent chow ( Formula 8904, Harlan Teklad, Madison, WI), except for woodrats, which were fed powdered rabbit chow ( Formula 2031, Harlan Teklad, Madison, WI), given that woodrats are herbivorous and develop diabetes and metabolic syndromes when fed omnivorous diets ( Post et al. 2015; Schmidt - Nielsen et al. 1964).
